quoteText:
Valve may amend this Agreement (including any Subscription Terms or Rules of Use) unilaterally at any time in its sole discretion.
In this case, you will be notified by e-mail of any amendment to this Agreement made by Valve within 60 (sixty) days before the entry into force of the said amendment.
You can view the Agreement at any time at http://www.steampowered.com/.
Your failure to cancel your Account within thirty (30) days after the entry into force of the amendments, will constitute your acceptance of the amended terms.
title: Notifications 30 days before changes.

tosdr.case: When the service wants to make a material change to its terms, users are notified at least 30 days in advance
tosdr.tldr: Changes to the agreement are notified by email or within the program 30 days in advance.
